title: 《Minecraft: 故事模式》发布日期确定
author: sjjklh
txt_content:
如果你访问了上个月PAX Prime展会上Telltale的展台，你一定已经对《Minecraft: 故事模式》有了一点了解，或者至少你也看到了我们酷炫到爆的展位。如果你当时并未来到西雅图，也不要着急，因为我们今天可以正式宣布，下个月大家就能看到《Minecraft: 故事模式》的预告片了！

第一章：“石之秩序”Episode 1: 'The Order of the Stone,' ，全五章中的第一章，会在今年的10月13日星期三发布数字预告片。发售时，本章将会出现在PC/Mac平台上的Telltale在线商店、Steam与其他游戏商家；PlayStation 3/4上的PlayStation Network；Xbox 360/One上的Xbox游戏商店。季度预告片将在10月15日星期四在iOS设备上的应用商店以及Android设备上的谷歌Play上的发布。本系列也会登陆Wii U与PS Vita——请保持关注这两个平台的更多消息！

（注：本文中未提到10月27日的发布日，但Twitter上提到了）



也许你还没看过介绍视频？
http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XMTI3NzY5NzgzNg==.html


 与往常一样，我们准备了丰富多彩的内容等待你去探索。当然我们可以来一点小小的剧透。


（明天早起上班没时间了，欢迎补充翻译下文）

In Minecraft: Story Mode, playing as either a male or female hero named ‘Jesse,’ you’ll embark on a perilous adventure across the Overworld, through the Nether, to the End, and beyond. You and your friends revere the legendary Order of the Stone: Warrior, Redstone Engineer, Griefer, and Architect; slayers of the Ender Dragon. While at EnderCon in hopes of meeting Gabriel the Warrior, Jesse’s friends discover that something is wrong... something dreadful. Terror is unleashed, and you must set out on a quest to find The Order of the Stone if you are to save your world from oblivion.

We’ve been working closely with the people at Mojang to ensure that Minecraft: Story Mode absolutely feels like a part of the world that Minecraft players already know and love, with a cinematic story and trademark Telltale choice-based gameplay. We know how important customization is to the creative minds who play Minecraft, so we’ve paid special attention to implementing that in Minecraft: Story Mode too. This is the first Telltale game where YOU get to choose the appearance of the player character. Not only do you get to play as either a male or female version of Jesse, you’ll also be able to select from 3 different looks for each.




If you've been keeping up with Telltale news, you'll know that we’ve also managed to snag some seriously all-star voice talent for the season. Male Jesse is portrayed by Patton Oswalt (you might recognize his voice from Ratatouille and Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D), while female Jesse is voiced by Catherine Taber (she’s been in Star Wars: The Clone Wars and Marvel Heroes). The season will also feature Brian Posehn, Ashley Johnson, Scott Porter, Martha Plimpton, Dave Fennoy, Corey Feldman, Billy West, and Paul Reubens – and there are still more cast details to come! We couldn’t possibly be more excited to be working with such an amazing group of actors.And one quick note for those looking forward to the season finales of Tales from the Borderlands and Game of Thrones – they are shaping up to be two of our most ambitious finales yet! Look out for more news on those coming out soon.

We’ve been working closely with the people at Mojang to ensure that Minecraft: Story Mode absolutely feels like a part of the world that Minecraft players already know and love, with a cinematic story and trademark Telltale choice-based gameplay. 我们与整个MOJANG的员工经过密切合作，在精彩故事和Telltale解密游戏模式的基础上，确保《Minecraft：故事模式》是Minecraft玩家所熟悉和热爱的那个世界的一部分。我们亦了解对富有创造性的Minecraft玩家来说关卡的重要性，所以我们也格外注意其在《Minecraft：故事模式》中的实现。《Minecraft：故事模式》是第一个可以选择玩家外貌的Telltale解密游戏，你不仅能选择男性版或是女性版Jesse，每版还将有三个不同外貌可以选择

Minecraft:故事模式,作为一个男性或女性英雄命名的杰西,你就踏上了一条危险冒险Overworld对面,穿过虚空,到最后,甚至更远。你和你的朋友敬畏的传奇顺序斯通:战士,雷石东工程师,悲伤,和建筑师;秀逗的安德龙。在EnderCon希望会议Gabriel战士,杰西的朋友发现有点不对劲……可怕的东西。恐怖了,你必须踏上寻求发现石头的顺序从遗忘如果你拯救世界。 　　 　　我们一直在与人紧密合作确保Minecraft Mojang:故事模式绝对感觉就像一个世界的一部分,Minecraft玩家已经知道和爱,与一个电影的故事和商标指示作出游戏。我们知道定制的创意是多么重要Minecraft玩,所以我们特别关注的实现,在Minecraft:故事模式。这是第一的游戏,你可以选择玩家角色的外观。不仅你要扮演一个男性或女性版的杰西,你也可以选择从三个不同的查找。
